commits.message:
feat(git): Add automated post-commit hook for documentation and ABE

- Auto-organize documentation into folders (architecture, api, components, deployment)
- Generate documentation index with commit info
- Create ABE package (zip) in drop zone for processing
- Generate USIM header with commit metadata
- Update session cost tracker with commit history
- Hook runs automatically on every commit

Hook creates:
- docs/INDEX.md (auto-generated index)
- .usim (USIM metadata header)
- ABE package in ~/Desktop/ABE-DropZone/

Next: ABE processes packages automatically for knowledge extraction
